creator: jcosta@lendlease.com
text:
I would like to be able to determine what objects (gif, jpeg, html, etc...) are
being stored in the memory cache (mod_mem_cache).

creator: chip@force-elite.com
text:
I assume you want some sort of generated page like a server-status or
ldap-status. Changing this to an enhancement request.

Paul--Yes, I'd like to see this as a generated page, similar to server-status. I
was thinking of the following items:

Total requests served
Fresh hits
Stale hits (cache misses)
Number of documents in cache
Size of documents in cache
Count of documents in cache (# of jpegs, gifs, css files, etc...)
Popular requests
creator: jcosta@lendlease.com
covener@gmail.com
text: memcache has been removed from trunk, so closing this enhancement request.
